original_text: While he rules, the people of Judah will be safe. And Israel's people will live in peace. People will give this name to him: “The Lord is our righteous Saviour.” ’ While he rules, the people of Judah will be safe.
korean_text: 그의 날에 유다는 구원을 받겠고 이스라엘은 평안히 살 것이며 그의 이름은 여호와 우리의 공의라 일컬음을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: the people of Judah will be safe
And Israel's people will live in peace
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성은 평화롭게 살 것이다

sentences.original_text: People will give this name to him
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들은 그에게 이 이름을 붙일 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Lord is our righteous Saviour
the people of Judah will be safe
